entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 29.
